component.name: Ente Auth
component.summary: Open source 2FA authenticator, with end-to-end encrypted backups

description.p: Auth provides end-to-end encrypted cloud backups so you don't have to worry about losing your tokens. Our cryptography has been externally audited.
Auth has an app for every platform. Mobile, desktop and web. Your codes sync across all your devices, end-to-end encrypted.
Auth also comes with Offline mode, tags, icons, pins, import/export and more
